question: The "Bahia de las Aguillas" bay is located in which country?
explanation: The Bahia de las Aguillas is a bay which hosts one of the most beautiful beaches in the world, located in the south-west of the island country of the Dominican Republic in the Hispaniola Islands of the Greater Antilles Archipelago in the West Indies-Caribbean region facing the Caribbean Sea. It is also known as "Eagle's Bay", located near to the Dominican Republic-Haiti border. This bay is a protected area as is the surrounding park which forms part of the Jaragua National Park. This bay hosts abundant sea life.
